original_title: Cincinnati Music Hall: The Next Movement
overview: For 16 months the doors of Music Hall are closed as an historic renovation process ensues. CET is documenting this complex undertaking with compelling interviews and stunning visuals that provide the audience a seat at the table where decisions are made and progress is monitored. It all leads to the much-anticipated grand re-opening of Music Hall on October 6.
title: Cincinnati Music Hall: The Next Movement
